interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Grown Alchemist Anti-Pollution Primer (50ml / 1.69oz) Review Date: 2022/04/24 Store: Grown Alchemist Product Description: ['GROWN ALCHEMIST ANTI – POLLUTION PRIMER. A revolutionary lightweight detoxifying, silicone-free gel-primer absorbs instantly creating the ultimate protected, smooth surface; hydration levels are visibly boosted, the skin’s natural healthy barrier function is noticeably strengthened while wrinkles and pores are blurred to create healthy, flawless-looking skin. BIOACTIVE INGREDIENTS. Offering a blend of Bioactive Ingredients including: Anti-Pollution Shield Complex - A potent formula, Prebiotic-Peptide, Gel-Primer Base Complex offers a silicone-free base with skin hydrating properties and Ganoderma Mushroom Extract inhibits oxidation and inflammation which assists in the detoxification of skin cells. THE GROWN ALCHEMIST DIFFERENCE. Providing the most advanced natural cosmetic products, everything is formulated with the purest and highest quality active ingredients supported by scientific research and clinical results. Developed by a multidisciplinary team of skin scientists and nutritionists, GA has developed a unique, natural and holistic beauty system, combining both topical and ingestible skincare. SCIENTIFICALLY-INNOVATIVE FORMULAS. Grown Alchemist formulates products that represent a new evolution in skincare. Scientifically–innovative formulas are capable of influencing the way the body repairs and regenerates the skin. Through a holistic scientific approach, GA identifies the mechanisms that regulate the aging process of the body and skin. RELEASING YOUR TRUE BEAUTY. Grown Alchemist continues to challenge the status quo in the world of beauty, formulating ground-breaking anti-aging results. Founders Keston and Jeremy have stayed true to their promise to create advanced natural products that improve the health of skin cells, optimizing their function and ultimately, releasing your true beauty.'] Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Grown Alchemist', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Coverage': 'Lightweight', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Language': 'English', 'Product Dimensions': '3.94 x 1.57 x 1.97 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'Item model number': '9340800005494', 'Manufacturer': 'Grown Alchemist'} Review Text: I was fooled by the look of this in the tube - it looked dark. So i was somewhat surprised when i squeezed some out onto my hand and it’s actually colourless.

Upon application, it smooths instantly into my skin, and transforms to a perfectly powdery finish, silky almost. Pores are minimized definitely, and it makes applying make up afterward, an absolute breeze.

I was using Tatcha Primers - i tried both their Liquid Silk Canvas, which is much lighter in texture than their Silk Canvas which i always found a little difficult spreading evenly.

This Grown Alchemist Anti Pollution Primer reminds me of a favourite i used - Benefit Porefessional, with a similar texture to that.

It does minimize my pores. It makes my skin feel great, and ml for ml works out cheaper than Benefit’s, so that’s a win win situation.

And whether i apply foundation or just a powder on top, both go on super smoothly, and nothing settles into the cracks.

I’m very much enjoying this primer. Review Title: Great texture Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
invisibobble Pink Ball Hair Ties with Coil, TWINS Prima Ballerina - Ponytail Holder - No Damage, Wrap and Twist - Pain-Free Hair Accessories for Girls and Women - Gentle for Girls Teens and Thick Hair invisibobble {'Color': 'Prima Ballerina', 'Item Form': 'Spiral', 'Brand': 'Invisibobble', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '1.97 x 0.87 x 1.85 inches', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Language': 'Spanish', 'Product Dimensions': '1.97 x 0.87 x 1.85 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'IB-TW', 'Manufacturer': 'invisibobble'} My hair isn’t very thick, it’s maybe shoulder length, and i sometimes wear it up, but i don’t have too much hair so regular scrunchies and hair elastics are too much for my thinning hair. This small thing works great on my particular length, thickness and curliness of hair. You just twiddle the bobbles around each other, and it makes my hair look classier than i thought it would. It works very well because of my curls. I did used to used the bigger spiral hair ties from this brand when I had thicker, longer hair, but those are too big for the amount of hair i have now. This works perfectly though. It’s just right. Good for my thinning, but very curly hair invisibobble Pink Ball Hair Ties with Coil, TWINS Prima Ballerina - Ponytail Holder - No Damage, Wrap and Twist - Pain-Free Hair Accessories for Girls and Women - Gentle for Girls Teens and Thick Hair invisibobble {'Color': 'Prima Ballerina', 'Item Form': 'Spiral', 'Brand': 'Invisibobble', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '1.97 x 0.87 x 1.85 inches', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Language': 'Spanish', 'Product Dimensions': '1.97 x 0.87 x 1.85 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'IB-TW', 'Manufacturer': 'invisibobble'} My hair is maybe shoulder length, layered, and thinning, and i can twiddle one these up into my hair with no issues. I feel like someone with thicker hair might struggle getting one in.

I really like them, as they give me a messy, sort of updo kind of look, without it looking like a formal ponytail. Which is impossible for me anyway, with my layered curly thinning hair. In fact the only way for to achieve a smooth head of hair is to use a flatiron and a ton of product, and i just don’t do that. It looks unnatural on me. I like these for the ability to look casual and unstructured. When i had longer thicker hair,i used the original invisibobble spirals, which were a game changer. These products do not tangle in your hair like a regular hair elastic often does. The products made by this company have revolutionized ponytails. Perfect for short to medium hair Grown Alchemist Anti-Pollution Primer (50ml / 1.69oz) Grown Alchemist ['GROWN ALCHEMIST ANTI – POLLUTION PRIMER. Offering a blend of Bioactive Ingredients including: Anti-Pollution Shield Complex - A potent formula, Prebiotic-Peptide, Gel-Primer Base Complex offers a silicone-free base with skin hydrating properties and Ganoderma Mushroom Extract inhibits oxidation and inflammation which assists in the detoxification of skin cells. THE GROWN ALCHEMIST DIFFERENCE. Developed by a multidisciplinary team of skin scientists and nutritionists, GA has developed a unique, natural and holistic beauty system, combining both topical and ingestible skincare. Scientifically–innovative formulas are capable of influencing the way the body repairs and regenerates the skin. Through a holistic scientific approach, GA identifies the mechanisms that regulate the aging process of the body and skin. RELEASING YOUR TRUE BEAUTY. So i was somewhat surprised when i squeezed some out onto my hand and it’s actually colourless.

And whether i apply foundation or just a powder on top, both go on super smoothly, and nothing settles into the cracks.

I’m very much enjoying this primer. Great texture
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Type & Concerns:** The user has shoulder-length, thinning, and layered curly hair, preferring hair accessories that are gentle on fine textures and enhance styling without adding bulk.
- **Product Preferences:** Enjoys gentle, pain-free hair accessories that minimize damage while providing versatile, casual styles. The user has recently shown an interest in skincare products that emphasize lightweight formulations and effective hydration.
- **Functional Focus:** Values ease of use and functionality, looking for products that enhance hair and skin appearance without the need for complex tools or techniques. They seek solutions tailored to their specific hair and skin needs.
- **Aesthetic Considerations:** Prefers accessories and products that contribute to a relaxed yet stylish look, aligning more with casual aesthetics.
- **Brand Loyalty:** Shows familiarity and loyalty to brands known for quality and innovative solutions, indicating a willingness to explore various product types based on personal needs.
- **Review Behavior:** Actively engages in detailed and thoughtful reviews, reflecting a focus on product effectiveness for her unique concerns. Recent feedback highlights a strong appreciation for products that provide ease of application and healthy results.

Overall, the user prioritizes gentle, effective, and stylish solutions for both their curly hair and skincare, emphasizing practicality, comfort, and a laid-back aesthetic.
